Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; discoloured white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown below; part of faded rosette in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: at rim, band of oblique strokes above frieze of reversed Z; below, painted decoration consisting of possibly back (with red patch) of animal; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0435) (phase 2)
